links.title: Elliott Wave View: Apple (AAPL) Rally Should Fail
links.description: Short term Elliott Wave view in Apple (AAPL) suggests the rally to 179.59 ended wave ((X)). Wave ((Y)) lower is currently in progress. The decline from ((X)) peak is unfolding as an ABC zigzag Elliott Wave structure. Down from wave ((X)), wave ((i)) ended at 171.94 and rally in wave ((ii)) ended at 178.66.

body: 2018/2019 a lot of fear surrounded $AAPL w/ China. Lost about 39%, bottomed @ 200MA off the weekly to almost pin point perfection. Severe problems persist in China again but how much it affects Apple is unknown. Apple must fall before market goes up, imo. Pundits aren’t bearish yet, when they are it’s a good thing IMO. $SPY

The buys took place at prices ranging from $0.00 to $165.29 per share, on April 15, 2022. Kondo now owns 44,921 shares of the company.
